org.zeprs.logic
Class Persistance

java.lang.Object
  org.cidrz.webapp.dynasite.logic.Persistance
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class Persistance
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter

Filter which manages a ThreadLocal hibernate session. Obtain the session by calling Persistance.getSession(). Define the JNDI name of the hibernate session factory as an init param to the filter in your web.xml.

          Default value if no init param is set.

getSession

public static net.sf.hibernate.Session getSession()
                                           throws net.sf.hibernate.HibernateException
ONLY ever call this method from within the context of a servlet request (specifically, one that has been associated with this filter). If you want a Hibernate session at some other time, call getSessionFactory() and open/close the session yourself.

Returns:
an appropriate Session object
Throws:
net.sf.hibernate.HibernateException

getSessionFactory

public static net.sf.hibernate.SessionFactory getSessionFactory()
Returns:
the hibernate session factory

rollback

public static void rollback(net.sf.hibernate.Transaction tx)
This is a simple method to reduce the amount of code that needs to be written every time hibernate is used.
